wikipedia_page.main: Peter Martin Welsh (born 19 July 1959) is a Scottish former footballer, who played for Leicester City in the Football League and Hibernian, Falkirk and Alloa Athletic in the Scottish Football League.

response: *Peter Welsh (footballer born 1951), Australian rules footballer for Footscray
